name: ​Rosey's Wild West
description:
How to Play

A S D - move

Space - jump

Use mouse to click and shoot. Rosey's gun has six shots, and every reload will have its damage determined by a roll of a dice. Rosey also has dice armor where her damage is reduced by a percentage determined by a dice roll.

Currently there is no game reset implemented, please refresh the browser if Rosey dies.

Rosey's Story

Rosey's embarks on an adventure in the wild west to save her town from the curse of the Ghost Bandits.

Roll of the Dice

This game uses dice to determine damage output. Upon reload, a dice is rolled to determine your damage multiplier. This game also uses dice to determine your damage reduction, upon hit, it is rerolled.

Team

Built by a small team of 3:

Raphael K Mohan (Art) (Instagram)

Annyn Matheson (Coding)

George Chan (Coding)

Music

Gunshot SFX o “Retro Gun Shot” – freesound.org, Jofae - Boss Roar 1 o “Creature Roar 1” – freesound.org, jacobalcook 

Running SFX o “Running.02.wav” – freesound.org, stintx - Ghost Hurt SFX o “PlayerHurt1” – freesound.org, mrickey13
